title: Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine School | NWHSU
author: Kim Christensen; LAc '; Healing Arts
description: At NWHSU's Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine school, you'll gain expertise of whole-body wellness to harness the value of integrative health.
cleaned_text: Launch your career as an acupuncturist in a program with unmatched clinical internship opportunities NWHSU's acupuncture and Chinese medicine program prepares you to be a leader in the future of healthcare. You'll graduate confident in your knowledge of Chinese medicine theory, and with a deep understanding of how to apply that knowledge in our current healthcare environment. Our program features an unrivaled clinical internship program. You'll have the opportunity to work with diverse patient populations under the supervision of experienced practitioners who care about your success. You'll also work alongside practitioners in chiropractic care, massage therapy, and other integrative care disciplines: preparing you to work in the future of healthcare.
